pubmedparser-error: Generic error message for the PubmedParser extension.
pubmedparser-error-nodata: Error message produced by the PubmedParser extension if no data was received.
pubmedparser-error-invalidpmid: Error message produced by the PubmedParser extension if the given PMID is invalid.
pubmedparser-error-cannotdownload: Error message produced by the PubmedParser extension if the PubMed API is not accessible.
pubmedparser-error-dberror: Error message produced by the PubmedParser extension if the database schema is not ready.
pubmedparser-error-invalidxml: Error message produced by the PubmedParser extension if the PubMed XML is invalid.
pubmedparser-templatename: Name of the template to use for PubMed citations.
pubmedparser-authors: Name of the PubMed template variable to show the citation's authors.
pubmedparser-authorsi: Name of the PubMed template variable to show the citation's authors with initials.
pubmedparser-allauthors: Name of the PubMed template variable to show all of the citation's authors.
pubmedparser-allauthorsi: Name of the PubMed template variable to show all of the citation's authors with initials.
pubmedparser-journal: Name of the PubMed template variable to show the citation's journal.
pubmedparser-journalcaps: Name of the PubMed template variable to show the citation's journal with capitals.
pubmedparser-journala: Name of the PubMed template variable to show the citation's journal abbreviation.
pubmedparser-journalanop: Name of the PubMed template variable to show the citation's journal abbreviation with capitals.
pubmedparser-volume: Name of the PubMed template variable to show the citation's journal volume.
pubmedparser-pages: Name of the PubMed template variable to show the citation's page numbers.
pubmedparser-firstpage: Name of the PubMed template variable to show the citation's first page number.
pubmedparser-year: Name of the PubMed template variable to show the citation's publication year.
pubmedparser-doi: Name of the PubMed template variable to show the citation's digital object identifier (DOI).
pubmedparser-pmc: Name of the PubMed template variable to show the citation's PubMed Central ID (PMCID).
pubmedparser-title: Name of the PubMed template variable to show the citation's title.
pubmedparser-abstract: Name of the PubMed template variable to show the citation's abstract.
pubmedparser-and: Symbol or word to use in PubMed citation templates as 'and'.
pubmedparser-etal: Symbol or words to use in PubMed citation templates as 'et al.'.
pubmedparser-initialseparator: Symbol to use in PubMed citations to separate authors' initials.
pubmedparser-initialperiod: Symbol to place after authors' initials in PubMed citations.
pubmedparser-reload: Parameter to use in PubmedParser parser function calls to force reloading the PubMed citation.
